ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: twisting troubles
ygData.msgSnippet: Then switch to a rogue, you wont feel like your missing out on playtime! Not only that, but there are zones you can cross by hitting hide/sneak/autorun and
ygData.messageBody:
Then switch to a rogue, you wont feel like your missing out on playtime!
Not only that, but there are zones you can cross by hitting
hide/sneak/autorun and then leaving your computer for an hour or two to play
with the little ones. ;^)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Bill Costlow [mailto:atlatyl@...]
> Sent: Thursday, April 13, 2000 8:49 AM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: twisting troubles
>
>
> --- "Webber, Jessica" <webber@...> wrote:
>
> > Fight one blue mob, sit,
> > run downstairs & wash the dishes, run upstairs &
> > check on HP, run downstairs
> > & fold laundry, run upstairs, repeat from top...
> >
>
> LOL! I am a single parent...this is the way I play
> all the time!
>
